title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 364-4.3 - Application procedures for permit renewals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 364-4.3 - Application procedures for permit renewals

State Regulations
(a) Applications for permit renewals must be
received by the department at least 30 days in advance of the expiration date
of the existing permit. (b) If the
complete permit renewal application is not received at least 30 days prior to
permit expiration, the department may treat the application as a new permit
application. (c) Annual reports
must be submitted in accordance with Subpart 364-5 of this Part. (d) A renewal of a permit may be denied by
the department for failure of the permittee to submit an annual report, as
required by Subpart 364-5 of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
364-4.3

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
